person:biography.personal-details:content: I am a clinical psychologist and MRFF Translating Research into Practice (TRIP) Fellow at the Centre for Youth Substance Abuse Research, The University of Queensland, Australia. My research focuses on the cognitive and neuropsychological mechanisms involved in impulsivity and risk for substance abuse. I am a passionate advocate for the scientist-practitioner model and maintain my clinical practice as a Visiting Senior Clinical Psychologist at the Alcohol and Drug Assessment Unit, Princess Alexandra Hospital.
